column4: is there an ubuntu irc channel for legal usage of ubuntu logo etc etc
and for making money by installing and admin'ing an ubuntu server?
ok, thanks
for the second you dont need to ask someone
for the first, there is a licence for the usage of the logo
oh, and you think it's legal for me to sell ubuntu and adminitster legally?
of course
you can of course sell ubuntu
the one you are not allowed to do is so remaster ubuntu to something else and sell it as "ubuntu"
but the normal ubuntu versions you can sell as many as you want to any price
but!! if you sell ubuntu you have to grant access to the sources
of course
but the sources are public so you dont have to do anything aditional
but the better idea would be to provide ubuntu as free (as in free beer) and give payed support
correct sir. :-)
or what would be very interesting for us "sell hardware with preinstalled ubuntu"
that's the end goal. i am trying to locate a smaller tech company that already has connection with major hardware vendors. :-)
good to see someone is working on this bug https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bug/1
buwahahaaaaaaaaaa
